item.title: Hello: blog
item.description: Greetings I plan to start blogging through this domain from now on. Generally, I expect to focus on things that would have helped ‘past Gus’ from about a month ago. Things like how I finally managed to solve an annoying python bug or analysis problem. From time to time, I also want to highlight some of the research projects that I contribute to. All in all, it remains to be seen exactly how this will shape up.
